title: An Act establishing the Abigail Adams entrepreneurial program for women

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Silvia of Fall River, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 499) of Alan Silvia for legislation to establish the Abigail Adams center for women in STEM to provide opportunities for women in the workforce in science, technology, engineering and mathematics professions.  Economic Development and Emerging Technologies.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

related_entities.name: committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 06/05/2025 from 11:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
